Career.pageSubtitle: A timeline of my academic and professional achievements.
Career.fullStackDescription: Developed and maintained web applications using React, Next.js, NestJS, and PostgreSQL. Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Career.codeIgniterDescription: Developed and maintained web applications using CodeIgniter and MySQL. Implemented new features and optimized existing ones. Collaborated with designers and other developers to ensure project success.

SkillsPage.description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I've worked with throughout my career.

IndexPage.schoolManagementSystemDescription: A comprehensive system for managing school operations, including student records, courses, and grades. Built with React for the frontend and Spring Boot for the backend, utilizing PostgreSQL for the database and Docker for containerization.
IndexPage.wineManagementApplicationDescription: An application designed for managing wine inventory, sales, and vineyard operations. Developed using Java Spring Boot with Thymeleaf for server-side rendering, Hibernate/JPA for ORM, and PostgreSQL for data storage.
IndexPage.personalPortfolioWebsiteDescription: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and career journey. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering and static site generation, styled with Tailwind CSS, and enhanced with Framer Motion for animations and Next-intl for internationalization.
IndexPage.carSalesManagementPlatformDescription: A platform for managing car sales, inventory, and customer data. The project includes a desktop application built with Java and a web application developed using PHP, HTML, and CSS, with FPDF for report generation.
IndexPage.realTimeWeatherApplicationDescription: A mobile application that provides real-time weather updates based on the user's location. Developed using React Native and JavaScript, styled with Tailwind CSS, and integrated with a weather API for data retrieval.
IndexPage.scientificSocialNetworkDescription: A social network platform designed for scientific collaboration and knowledge sharing. The frontend is built with Next.js, and the backend is powered by NestJS, using PostgreSQL for the database, JWT for authentication, and OAuth for authorization.
IndexPage.aiTrainingGenerationDescription: A project focused on generating AI training data using Python and PyTorch. It involves machine learning techniques and data augmentation strategies to create robust datasets for AI model training.
IndexPage.carMusicPartyDescription: A mobile and web application for creating and managing collaborative music playlists for car parties. Built with React Native for mobile, Next.js for web, Firebase for backend services, Socket.IO for real-time communication, and Tailwind CSS for styling.
IndexPage.dentalPracticeManagementSystemDescriptio: A comprehensive system for managing dental practice operations, including appointments, patient records, and billing. The project involved UX/UI design with Figma, and implementation using Swift for iOS, Nuxt.js for the web, MongoDB for the database, and Golang for the backend API.
